cities.name: Zurich
cities.fact: Switzerland has four national languages: German, French, Italian, and Romansh.

cities.name: Paris
cities.fact: Paris is the only city in the world, where the the famous McDonalds logo is not written in yellow, instead they used white.

cities.name: Hong Kong
cities.description: an autonomous territory on the Pearl River Delta of East Asia.
cities.fact: Hong Kong’s official languages are Chinese (Spoken Cantonese) and English.

cities.name: Tokyo
cities.fact: There are almost 3 000 residents in Tokyo’s regions per m2 – it is the most densely populated area in the world.

cities.name: New York
cities.fact: 15,150 forms of live organisms have been found in the New York(subway) system (this includes bacteria and some insects)

cities.name: Moscow
cities.fact: Trains in Moscow are the most frequent in the world, coming every 1.5minutes after the last one.

cities.name: Istanbul
cities.fact: Istanbul has the third oldest subway in the world. It was built in 1875. It is 573m long.
